content: the chart except for the first two row marked by a rectangle c s start the round in colour a work bridge 1 and continue working the r28 r30 r32 of hart b ock 2 the transition to the heel turn is indicated in chart b sock 2 in the last two row these two row should be understood in the following way the left and the right side of the chart present the first two row of the instep which has a separate instep chart c for continuation after these two row and the sole and similar for the second heel in chart b sock 1 in the middle the heel turn is indicated with two row and the heel turn part is marked by black rectangle the first row is knit the second row is purled back and they correspond to r1 and r2 in description of the heel turn respectively 6 skyscrapers swim the heel is worked forth and back using 26 28 30 stitches between markers only *r1 k14 15 16 ssk k1 turn 9 10 11 stitches remain unworked r2 sl1 p3 p2tog p1 turn 9 10 11 stitches remain unworked r3 sl1 knit to one stitch before the gap ssk k1 turn r4 sl1 purl to one stitch before the gap p2tog p1 turn repeat r3 and r4 3 more times size s you have finished 10 row of heel turn and have 14 stitches between gaps and 1 unworked stitch outside the gaps on each side r11 sl1 knit to one stitch before the gap ssk turn r12 sl1 purl to one stitch before the gap p2tog size m you have finished 10 row of heel turn and have 14 stitches between gaps and 2 unworked stitches outside the gaps on each side r11 sl1 knit to one stitch before the gap ssk k1 turn r12 sl1 purl to one stitch before the gap p2tog p1 size l work row 3 and 4 one more time you finished 12 row of heel turn and have 16 stitches between gaps and 1 unworked stitch outside the gap on each side r13 sl1 knit to one stitch before the gap ssk turn r14 sl1 purl to one stitch before the gap p2tog you have finished on the wrong side turn knit across the heel stitches and continue chart b* continue working r28 r30 r32 according to chart b sock 2 for the appropriate size to bridge 2 and across it work 32 36 40 stitches according to chart b sock 1 now you are at the beginning of the back leg of sock 1 repeat instructions between *…* for turning the second heel starting with r1 continue working the r28 r30 r32 according to chart b sock 1 for the appropriate size to bor work r29 r31 r33 of charts b sock 2 first ssotcitkc h1 next from now on sole stitches are simple stocking instep stitches follow chart c for the aptphreo priate size
